verbs.description: [ARG0: People close to President Donald Trump] [V: keep] [ARG1: suggesting that Cohen — who has yet to be charged with a crime — will flip in exchange for a lesser punishment] .

People close to President Donald Trump keep suggesting that Cohen — who [V: has] yet to be charged with a crime — will flip in exchange for a lesser punishment .
People close to President Donald Trump keep suggesting that Cohen — who has yet to [V: be] charged with a crime — will flip in exchange for a lesser punishment .
People close to President Donald Trump keep suggesting that Cohen — [ARG1: who] has yet to be [V: charged] [ARG2: with a crime] — will flip in exchange for a lesser punishment .
